data.prayer: Jesus, make the 331,691 people in the state of Atlántida who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Atlántida, Honduras
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Atlántida, Honduras.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Atlántida, Honduras so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Atlántida that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Atlántida, Honduras a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Atlántida, Honduras from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary:
the state of Atlántida, Honduras has a population of 486,200.

We estimate Atlántida has 133,588 people who might know Jesus, 331,691 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 20,921 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Atlántida, Honduras.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.
